entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Additional read from memory when reading a field in a struct #92093
  • Runtime test output transcripts in the xml result files use excessive escaping rendering them basically unreadable #92092
    9.0.0
  • JSON serialization -- int to string. -- exception #92091
  • DateTimeOffset constructor returning incorrect offset on macOS & Linux #92084
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Update `System.Memory` nuget package with `Span<T>.Sort` extensions #92081
  • CBOR does not handle canonical NaN correctly #92080
  • Audit identifier formatting algorithm in config binding & JSON generators #92079
    9.0.0
  • [Proposal]: Make MemoryStream use an unrolled linked list as the internal buffer #92078
  • `url.scheme` tag is emitted as part of `http.client.request.duration` metric that does not match the OTel spec #92077
  • [API Proposal]: Add constructor to AssemblyLoadContext that's accepting custom path #92074
  • RegistryKey.GetValue does not account for underlying value changes while reading strings/byte arrays #92072
  • [API Proposal]: Add InvalidEnumArgumentException.ThrowIfUndefined #92071
  • ComInterfaceGenerator.Unit.Tests crashes on net9.0-linux-Debug-x64-Mono_release-Ubuntu.2204.Amd64.Open #92070
  • Cbor{Reader, Writer} should support RFC 8949 determinism #92068
  • Socket.ConnectAsync(EndPoint, CT) does not pass CT to DNS query, enabling code with many concurrent connections to the same DNS name to reach a state where no further connections get established because all DNS queries time out #92054
    9.0.0
  • CustomMarshaller uses confusion #92049
  • Methods were covariant return types applies does not inherit attributes #92047
  • System.Net.Dns.RunAsync() does not decrement telemetry for canceled requests #92045
    9.0.0
  • DesignerAttribute/EditorAttribute size implications #92043
  • IndentedTextWriter doesn't use indentation on the first line. #92039
  • [API Proposal]: SortedSet inserted or appended indicator #92038
  • Test falilure GC/Features/SustainedLowLatency/scenario/scenario.sh #92036

Closed

  • [wasm] Perf pipeline broken due to the latest BDN update #92066
  • Android NTLM: Empty Credentials now throws PlatformNotSupportedException #91131
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Linq CountBy method #77716
    9.0.0
  • Why Use `If - If` instead of `If - Else If` or `switch-case` #92015
    Future
  • Microsoft.NET.HostModel.Tests failing with "No space left on device" #91039
    9.0.0
  • `Process.Start` will `System.ExecutionEngineException:“Exception_WasThrown”` in VS debug. #92046
  • 8.0.100-rc.1.23455.8 run dotnet run will crash #92050
  • Regressions in System.Net.Security.Tests.SslStreamTests #88098
    8.0.0
  • NetworkInformation.NetworkAddressChange not implemented on FreeBSD #27928
    9.0.0
  • .Net 8 Preview sending email exception #91377
    8.0.0
  • [Test Failure] System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.HttpClientHandlerTest_Http3.ServerSendsTrailingHeaders_Success #87552
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'curSize < maxSplitSize' during 'Emit code' #91251
    9.0.0
  • Assertion failed '!"Instruction cannot be encoded: IF_LS_2B"' during 'Generate code' #68536
    8.0.0
  • Crypto and Networking tests failing on Linux Mariner when running on Mono. #57506
    Future
  • Getting 400 error when I dont pass the object property in .Net 7 API #90653

PullRequests

Created

  • Add SHUTDOWNGUARD to NonGcHeapProfiler::ObjectAllocated #92096
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [wasi] Add AOT compiler build to the official build #92095
    area-Build-mono
  • Avoid marking property attributes multiple times #92094
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2267753 #92090
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Implement Linq AggregateBy method for IEnumerable and IQueryable #92089
    area-System.Linq, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix type parameter mapping logic in ILLink/ILCompiler #92088
    needs-area-label
  • fix ReceiveFrom with dual mode socket #92086
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 9.0.0
  • Use strategy in StrategyBasedComWrappers.ComputeVtables #92085
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • Use runsettings.targets to generate runsettings for host tests in local builds #92083
    area-Host
  • Fix support of FromKeyedServicesAttribute in ActivatorUtilities.CreateFactory #92082
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [release/8.0] Update FixupPrecode and StubPrecode types for ARM #92075
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Update installation process of nodejs 18.x to move away from the #92069
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, perf-pipeline
  • Implement support for `InlineArray` in the trimmer #92060
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • [mono][infra] Use llvm toolchain instead of binutils on linux #92057
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [iOS][Android] Refactor invoking native handler in HttpClientHandler #92051
    area-System.Net.Http, os-android, os-ios
  • [release/8.0] Remove public provider from rundown session #92048
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Permissive handling for runtimeconfig.json #92037
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Doc fix-ups to InstrumentRule #92035
    needs-area-label

Merged

  • Fix riscv64 build break due to NDirectImportPrecode::Type conflict #92087
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Fix performance-setup.sh to track change in BDN #92067
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, perf-pipeline
  • [release/8.0] Replace newline characters in NoWarn #92062
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Make src gen for property setters consistent with reflection #91899
    area-Extensions-Configuration, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Fix binder gen compile issues due to inaccessible members and identifier name clashes #91967
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Replace http.error.reason with OTel standard error.type #91996
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Remove implicit narrowing conversions from zlib #91962
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO.Compression
  • Implement Linq CountBy method for IEnumerable and IQueryable #91507
    area-System.Linq, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] Do not throw PNSE exception from NegotiateAuthentication constructor #91753
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Update FixupPrecode and StubPrecode types for ARM #92030
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] [wasi] Work around WASI's mmap implementation not returning aligned m… #92061
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Fix si.ibAllocated in FrozenObjectHeapManager #92052
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Arm64: Pass the small size accurately to emitIns_valid_imm_for_ldst_offset #92041
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Metrics Feature Switch #92019
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 8.0.0
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #91956
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Update THIRD-PARTY-NOTICES for 8.0 release #91933
    Servicing-approved, area-Setup
  • Switch `BundleExtractToSpecificPath` and `BundleAndRun` to using built test assets #92024
    test-enhancement, area-Single-File
  • [release/8.0] Don't shut down event pipe in DLLs on Windows #92044
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Delete the RequiresPreviewFeaturesAttribute from RefreshMemoryLimit #91688
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Replace newline characters in NoWarn #92010
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix InPlaceRuntime layering issues #91919
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][wasm] Only catch the exception thrown by mono_llvm_cpp_throw_e… #92040
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Fix si.ibAllocated in FrozenObjectHeapManager #92023
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Minimize net diff of binder-gen visibility/identifier-clash fix #91974
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 9.0.0
  • SPMI: Increase timeout for superpmi-asmdiffs-checked-release Helix work items #92020
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix assert about maximum fragment split size #92027
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Don't shut down event pipe in DLLs on Windows #91715
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete .NET Native left overs #91960
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Arm64: Pass the small size accurately to emitIns_valid_imm_for_ldst_offset #91741
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove code that is only applicable to emitting mscorlib.dll for .NET Framework #92034
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • enable AIA tests on Mariner #90199
    area-System.Security
  • Delete FEATURE_TRACELOGGING #91986
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Update `Marshal.QueryInterface()` argument modifier #91984
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] dumpwriterelf: increase buffer to fit a RHEL8 arm64 page. #91953
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Skip duplicate --info output if it is known SDK output #92013
    Servicing-approved, Servicing-consider, area-Host, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Make Options source gen support Validation attributes having constructor with array parameters #91934
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Added missing *Async overrides to TlsStream #91794
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 8.0.0

Updated

  • [PERF] Add hybrid globalization testing runs #89825
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [JIT] Optimize constant V512 vector with broadcast #92017
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-staging] Check for <framework_name>.deps.json when enumerating framework paths #92033
    Servicing-approved, area-Host, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0-staging] Check for <framework_name>.deps.json when enumerating framework paths #92032
    Servicing-approved, area-Host, 6.0.x
  • [wasi] Fix WasmLinkIcalls and WasmNativeStrip support. #91843
    area-Build-mono
  • Make config binding gen incremental #89587
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Fix: Config binder generator doesn't generate code when named arguments are out of order #91961
    area-System.Configuration
  • [Mono] Enable IL trim for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • Use `isinst` in `System.Data.Common.ObjectStorage:Set` #91945
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • Implement standalone GC loading in NativeAOT #91038
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [WIP] Unified intrinsics emission front-end experiments #91993
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • Reenable consumption of PGO data #91297
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Merge tests under tracing / Reflection / ReadyToRun / Regressions #92029
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Wraping both declaration and definition in #ifndef DISABLE_LOGGING. #91042
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fix max chunk size limiting #81607
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Check if loop body occured before loopTop and if so unmark alignment #91918
    Servicing-approved, blocked, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • Format/Parse binary from/to BigInteger #85392
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Converge Representations between NativeAOT and CoreCLR #91821
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Move SearchValues scalar loops into IndexOfAnyAsciiSearcher #91937
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • Enable Regex to use SearchValues<string> in compiled / source generator TryFindNextStartingPosition #88400
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 9.0.0
  • JIT: [experiment] Add an explicit IR representation for parameter definitions #92026
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • WIP: [mono] Clean up internal usage of `RuntimeComponents` to always be treated as MSBuild Item #91800
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Optimise long multiply + add/sub/neg on arm64. #91886
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] [wasm] Refactor Request Streaming to use HttpContent.CopyToAsync #91699
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Type load checks do not fail at compile time but produce a runtime exception #91261
    area-VM-meta-mono, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] regArg dependcies unrolling in genFnPrologCalleeRegArgs() #91904
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Light up BitArray APIs with Vector512 code path #91903
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Improve the trim incompatibility message for Assembly.GetType #91876
    area-System.Reflection, linkable-framework
  • [wasm] Migrate from catch_all to catch in the jiterpreter and destroy exceptions #91364
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Is it possible to use the SDK inside and Xamarin/MAUI app? #35419
  • Linux issue [libhostpolicy.so] #35410
  • `dotnet restore` does not support `-f TFM` #35408
  • `dotnet build` doesn't works, even on a bare console project #35403
  • `MSBuild` Code Analysis formatting exception #35388
  • namespace declaration style not defined in editorconfig #35383
  • Solution dependency exe project outputs to main project directory with TargetFramework and not with TargetFrameworks #35379

Closed

  • The `/etc/paths.d/` directory and the `dotnet-cli-tools` file are global for all users. Writing the full path of a specific user in this file should not be done. #35417

PullRequests

Created

  • Metrics switch support in the SDK #35418
    area-runtime, untriaged, 8.0.1xx
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #35412
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Write the full path of the dotnet tools directory in /etc/paths.d/dotnet-cli-tools #35411
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Find dotnet.exe from VS's MSBuild #35409
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.1xx #35407
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #35401
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #35400
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #35399
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Include APICompat resources #35398
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #35402
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/6.0.4xx] Update NuGet certificate thumbprints #35382
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/6.0.3xx] Update NuGet certificate thumbprints #35381
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update NuGet certificate thumbprints #35380
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #35375
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix package version in Microsoft.TemplateEngine.Mocks #35309
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • [8.0.1xx] Use MVC extensions from Razor transport #35371
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • Side by side workload manifests and garbage collection for file based installs #35106
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [main] Update dotnet/runtime #35048
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Workload history #34946
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Download tool packages from NuGet feeds directly, instead of implicitly restoring #33835
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.1xx #35324
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add escape hatch for PublishAot without RuntimeIdentifier. Fixes #33414. #35366
    Area-External, untriaged
  • Add `.mono` to `.gitingore` #35343
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update .editorconfig template #35268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-14
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: InterpolatedStringHandler allow method overload that has the "name" of the interpolated values. #7536

Updated

  • Disallow interfaces with static virtual members as type arguments #5955

PullRequests

Updated

  • Collection expressions: implicit collections in spreads and foreach #7534

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Collection literal with custom types not working #69950
  • Empty collection literals type is undetermined inside spread ternary. #69949
  • Sporadic NullReferenceException in CSharpDataSetDataTableInSerializableObjectGraphAnalyzer #69945

Closed

  • Document Outline clicking isn't working with collapsed regions #69902
  • Cursor jumps during editing with Document Outline enabled #69292
    17.8 P3
  • Freeze when switching to some C# file tabs while Document Outline feature is enabled #69903
  • Perf: Lazily populate FileIdentifier fields #69905
  • MSBuild and dotnet fails to build after .NET SDK 7.0.307 #69931
  • Invalid IL produced for an always-throwing filter expression #67494
    17.8
  • Collection expressions need to work with nullable-value-target-types #69447
    17.8
  • Internal Compiler Error for ExplicitTuple conversion in CodeGen/Emit #66265
    17.8

PullRequests

Created

  • Make ManagedToolTask.PathToManagedTool virtual #69958
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Perform a null check for a pattern-based fixed statement over nullable value type. #69957
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Check constructor for conversion to IEnumerable collection #69956
    New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Include a bit in DocumentId to indicate if it corresponds to a SG document or not #69952
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove indexer filtering from lookup #69947
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add new endpoint in roslyn to get token for multiple ranges #69946
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2266900 #69943

Merged

  • Publish Optprof config for PR validation build #69951
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • O# ExternalAccess: Provide InlineHint ranking to OmniSharp #69954
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #69955
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Provide capacities up front when synchronizing assets. #69953
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Lazily populate FileIdentifier fields #69882
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Colorize unbound `partial` identifier as a keyword #69877
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #69942
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Ensure Endfilter basic block is preserved even if technically unreachable. #69922
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Nullable conversion of collection expressions #69852
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, Next
  • Ensure tuple conversions involved into a tuple binary operator are properly lowered. #69934
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Allow Razor to format a new document it wants to create #69878
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove diagnostic source name field #69939
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add Quick Info test for 'see cref' #69930
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.7 to release/dev17.8 #69944
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Document outline updates #69921
    Area-IDE, untriaged, OnDeckForServicing
  • Merge release/dev17.7 to release/dev17.8 #69941
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Do source-generation only in our OOP process. #69917
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Replace InterceptorsPreview with InterceptorsPreviewNamespaces=global #69848
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implement find all references to preprocessing symbols #66425
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.9
  • Prototype of a public API (though currently internal) for roslyn features to expose the ability to report progress as they run. #50211
    Area-IDE
  • Remove unnecessary feeds #69928
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Fix declaration snippets after `partial` keyword #69874
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Revert "Revert "Use dictionary lookup while resolving assembly refere… #69891
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Dev/toddgrun/revert 769dfa13624dae1bbba1afbdfaeb85f928843004 and use multi dictionary pool #69896
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Cache ROS constructed from arrays of constants (remaining types) #69820
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • Collection expressions: avoid intermediate List<T> if spread elements have known length #69875
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Create a brokered service to delegate loading of projects to us #69857
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Peristent internal 'System.Text.Json.JsonException' #50720
  • Failed to load Blazor WebAssembly project in Production after upgrading to .NET 8 RC1 #50719
  • dotnet publish appears to be using an incorrect base container with DN8RC1 #50718
  • Razor Class Libary not rendering/serving static content (i.e. "_content/{PACKAGE}/file.js") on MACOS #50715
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #50714
  • Event handlers in layout do not seem to fire in a .NET 8 RC1 blazor application #50712
  • ASP .NET 8 RC1 Routing & UseStaticFiles #50707
  • Covariant THub-Parameter for IHubContext #50705
  • Incorrect swagger.json definition for GET endpoints in Minimal API when using Keyed Services #50704
    8.0-rc2
  • Was Username field really removed in .Net 8 rc-1? #50702
  • [SignalR-Client-Cpp] Fails in start() when there is no network connection #50698
  • Perf improvement: https, plainTextEmptyFilter #50696
  • Minimal ASP.NET Core AoT Publish through Visual Studio Creates Broken EXE- Failed to load assembly 'Microsoft.AspNetCore' #50694

Closed

  • Starting a new Blazor Web App sln fails after the first run #50682
  • .NET 8 RC1 Blazor Web App: [RenderModeAuto] keeps using the Server implementation then switches to WASM #50677
  • Process finished with exit code 139 - .NET 8 RC1 #50709
  • Add NativeAOT support for JwtBearer Authentication #47487
    8.0-rc1
  • Blazor time to first UI regression: blazorwasmbenchmark #50697
  • SpaProxyMiddleware: Allow custom SPA Loading Page #49605
  • 404 for _blazor/initializer after updating to RC1 #50688
  • Scaffolding using Razor Pages using Entity Framework (CRUD) uses antiquated bootstrap classes #50090
  • A11y_.NETCore_ASP.NETCore_About_Reflow: At reflow resolution "About" link is not visible in the page. #49703
    8.0-rc2
  • A11y_.NETCore_ASP.NETCore_About_Zoom: At 200% zoom "About" link is not visible in the page. #49702
    8.0-rc2
  • A11y_.NETCore_ASP.NETCore_BlazorWasmHome_NonTextContrast: Color contrast ratio between selected tab and non selected tab is 2.238:1 which is less than 3:1. #49790
    8.0-rc2
  • Blazor dotnet 8 preview 7 - Unexpected IDisposable.Dispose() #50404
    8.0
  • Blazor webassembly does not initialize components in the `LayoutComponentBase` after webassembly resources downloaded. #50585
    8.0-rc2
  • In Identity UI, "Logout" button does not show focus state #25675
    8.0-rc2
  • ASP.NET Implicitly Enables Authorization and Authentication #48469
    Discussions
  • Unified project template conventions and mitigating accidental inclusion in WebAssembly build #48758
    .NET 9 Planning
  • [Blazor] Wait until the initial page loads completely before activating interactive components #50344
    8.0-rc2
  • ControllerBase.Problem does not support configuring Extensions #43159
    .NET 8 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix XML docs on Redis OutputCaching extensions #50716
    area-networking, area-middleware
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2267489 #50713
    area-mvc
  • Replace ''return'' with lambda expression ''=>''. #50711
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • Update CSharp.Common.props #50710
    area-infrastructure
  • [Blazor] Javiercn/enhanced nav server #50703
    area-blazor
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #50695
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:

Merged

  • Omit keyed services from OpenAPI definitions #50717
    feature-openapi, area-minimal, 8.0-rc2
  • Fix dropping messages on reconnect #50409
    area-infrastructure, area-signalr, 8.0-rc2
  • SignalR MessageBuffer fixes #50315
    area-infrastructure, area-signalr, 8.0-rc2
  • Increment HubProtocol version for Stateful Reconnect #50442
    area-infrastructure, area-signalr, 8.0-rc2
  • Fix incoming connections with same ID sometimes failing incorrectly #50417
    area-infrastructure, area-signalr, 8.0-rc2
  • [release/7.0] Fix 6.0 SiteExtension version #50708
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.12
  • Fix 6.0 SiteExtensions version, turn SiteExtension build on in CI #50706

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • UI tests querying the same thing multiple times #17385
  • Label and ImageButton in Grid - Clicked doesn't fire on Android or iOS, works fine in Windows #17384
  • No Longer Able to Create MapSpan in XAML #17383
  • Binding doesn't update control property after manual update #17382
  • VisualStateManager with TargetName error XFC0001: Cannot resolve property #17380
  • Shell Tabbar Tab Title Selected Text Color & Choppy Animation On Windows #17378
  • BlazorWebView scale is not right for displays with scales greater than 100% #17372
  • [regression/8.0.0-rc.1.9171] SwipeView Execute mode does not work when using Binding Command #17371
    .NET 8 GA
  • Windows: CollectionView is flickering when an item is moved #17369
  • [regression/8.0.0-rc.1.9171] Vanilla app crashing on Windows in release mode #17368
  • [WinUI] Cannot invalidate measure and arrange for a ContentView #17367
  • LinearGradient from transparent to white is getting gray at the bottom #17366
    .NET 8 GA

Closed

  • Click events not working in Blazor Hybrid since Preview 7 #17375
    8.0-rc2
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.1.7762] [WinUI] CollectionView runtime binding errors when loading the ItemSource asynchronously #16787
    .NET 8 GA
  • Better design time error handling on static resources #17377
  • An error was encountered while registering a service worker js script in the MAUI Blazor Hybrid application #17095
  • FlexLayout Memory leak #10904
    Backlog
  • Shell.TitleView taps are not passed in iOS #14931
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] VisualState does not return to `Normal` state when using an `AppThemeBinding` #17354
    .NET 8 GA
  • Setting button IsEnabled to 'true' does not dynamically change background color to match dark/light theme #16538
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] `ArgumentException` on OnPropertyChanged #17357
    .NET 8 GA
  • A11y_.NET Core_MAUI_Recipe App_Screen reader : Narrator is announcing button but there is no visible control/button present in the screen #15598
    .NET 8 GA
  • .NET MAUI Blazor crash on Windows platform when call Shell.Current.GoToAsync() #8372
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Interface between platforms: UI #17370
  • [iOS] TitleView not working properly #17347
    .NET 8 GA
  • Grid Layout Child Elements Not Taking Full Width of the Screen #17194
  • Editor placed in Grid disappears when size changed #17206
  • OpenAsync with OpenFileRequest opens share window on iphone #17209

PullRequests

Created

  • Split out sharable testing for non-element thing #17387
  • Increase timeouts to 4 hours #17386
  • Draw Line using BackgroundColor #17376
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, .NET 8 GA
  • [X] fix CollectionItems enumeration #17364
    .NET 8 GA

Merged

  • Remove macOS as that is not installed by default #17379
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Revert changes to setting context and add tests #17348
    .NET 8 GA
  • [C] Port the specificity concept to Bindings #17215
    .NET 8 GA
  • Enable Mac Catalyst Controls Device Tests in CI #17229
    platform/macOS 🍏, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, .NET 8 GA
  • [C] Replace value with same specificity #17365
  • Added integration test for maui blazor maccatalyst codesign verification. #17331
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/testing, Blazor ❤️ MAUI, .NET 8 GA
  • Adjust tap tests so they can work on Windows/iOS #17325
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #17362
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Wait for parent to get set before realizing titleview #17360
    .NET 8 GA

Updated

  • Remove Debug and Release Entitlements plists and Replace with Custom Entitlements #16355
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/blazor 🕸️, area/templates 📄, Blazor ❤️ MAUI, .NET 8 GA
  • Remove reference to concrete native host app #16803
    area/hosting 🧩, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • Fix iOS InputTransparent layouts and add several InputTransparent UI tests #17286
    .NET 8 GA
  • Bump the aspnetcore group with 7 updates #17345
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, .NET 8 GA
  • [ci] Add MSI transport nugets to sign verify #17335
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 GA
  • Update Flyout when Shell.FlyoutContent changes #17359
    area/shell 🐢, partner/hot-reload-xaml, Under Consideration
  • Changing value of Shell.NavBarIsVisible should change visibility of toolbar (ShellToolbar) #17358
    area/shell 🐢, partner/hot-reload-xaml, Under Consideration
  • Enable WinUI Controls Test Pipeline #17221
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, .NET 8 GA
  • Fixes BindableLayout leaks and EmptyViewTemplate issues #17290
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 GA
  • [android] improve performance of Shell flyout opening #15733
    platform/android 🤖, area/perf 🏎️, .NET 8 GA
  • Add ViewHandler & IViewHandler docs #17167
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, s/pr-needs-author-input, .NET 8 GA

    area/Xaml </>, .NET 8 GA

  • Remove Previous TitleView from Toolbar #17353
    .NET 8 GA
  • Add basic Android automated accessibility testing #11097

  • Default ANDROID_SDK_ROOT if not set #15169

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Data inconsistency while loading entities based on new changed prop before DispatchDomainEventsInterceptor.SavingChangesAsync #31741
  • No backing field could be found for property ... and the property does not have a setter #31740
  • EFCore deletes an association on DbContext.SaveChanges when an existing link is removed and then added in the same transaction #31736
  • The issue of SQL statements following Sum after Groupby on EF6.0.5 #31733

Closed

  • SQL Server Index options SortInTempDB and DataCompression #30408
    8.0.0-rc2
  • Treat SQL Server Error Number 1222 as Transient (Lock request time out period exceeded) #31724
  • Model Snapshot won't compile with nested types #31735
  • When a parent and child entity has a one to many relationship and the child table is a temporal table, removing a child from its parent collection will trigger an unexpected error. #31535

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix to #29638 - GroupBy generates invalid SQL when using custom database function #31743
  • [release/7.0] Fix to #30996 - Incorrect translation of comparison of current value with owned type default value #31742
    Servicing-consider, 7.0.x
  • Treat SQL Pool warmup/pause errors as transient #31739
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #31738
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Merged

  • Add support for DATA_COMPRESSION and SORT_IN_TEMPDB SQL Server index options #30831
    waiting-for-response
  • [SMALL] Fix to #30996 - Incorrect translation of comparison of current value with owned type default value #31714
  • Treat Sql Error Number 1222 as Transient #31725
